@@ -93,11 +93,0 @@
-// Formatting.
-#ifdef _LP64
-# ifdef __APPLE__
-# define FORMAT64_MODIFIER "ll"
-# else
-# define FORMAT64_MODIFIER "l"
-# endif
-#else // !_LP64
-#define FORMAT64_MODIFIER "ll"
-#endif // _LP64

@@ -292,0 +292,3 @@
+

+  check_format(INT64_FORMAT_0,         (u8)0x123,         "0000000000000123");
